price: Dan dirikanlah salat, tunaikanlah zakat, dan rukuklah beserta orang-orang yang rukuk44.
arabic: وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَءَاتُواْ ٱلزَّكَوٰةَ وَٱرۡكَعُواْ مَعَ ٱلرَّٰكِعِينَ
footnotes: 44.  Yang dimaksud ialah salat berjemaah.  Dapat pula diartikan tunduklah kepada perintah­perintah Allah  Subḥānahu wa Ta‘ālā bersama-sama orang-orang yang tunduk.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata waātū al-zakata wa-ir'kaʿū maʿa al-rākiʿīna
